mapper.sql: id, module_id, title, industry_id, content, status, proposal_id, creater_id, create_time, updater_id, update_time
mapper.select: select a.data_id as id,a.module_id,b.title,b.content,b.industry_id from h_advertising_proposal_detail a join h_market b on a.module_id = b.module_id and a.data_id = b.id where a.p_module_id = #{pModuleId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.parent_id = #{proposalId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and b.status = 1
mapper.insert: insert into h_market (id, module_id, title, industry_id, content, status, proposal_id, creater_id, create_time, updater_id, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{proposalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into h_market
id,
module_id,
title,
industry_id,
content,
status,
proposal_id,
creater_id,
create_time,
updater_id,
update_time,

mapper.update:
update h_market
module_id = #{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
industry_id = #{industryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
proposal_id = #{proposalId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updater_id = #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update h_market set module_id = #{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry_id = #{industryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, proposal_id = #{proposalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updater_id = #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
